## Checklist
<!-- Confirm all items before submitting -->
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guide
- [ ] Skill includes `SKILL.md` with complete documentation
- [ ] Skill includes `LICENSE` file (Apache 2.0)
- [ ] All placeholders ({{...}}) have been replaced
- [ ] I have tested the skill and verified it works
- [ ] Validation passes: `./scripts/validate-skill.sh <skill-path>`
- [ ] No sensitive information (API keys, passwords, etc.) included
- [ ] Examples are clear and functional
- [ ] Code follows established conventions
